storyInfo: Yith is being watched by a certain Liberi, and Mostima had already known about the existence of the Rat King. The reunited Penguin Logistics team receive a call from Emperor and head towards the scene of the party.

attributes.content: 11:45 P.M. \ Cloudy
Downtown Lungmen, Cafe Al Fresco
A pleasant aroma
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: To enjoy such a lovely al fresco cafe, with a sandwich, by candlelight, as the people go by, with the fragrance of sweet candy,
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: It would be a truly relaxing experience were it not for this young lady staring daggers into me.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: ...I just happened to be walking by. But that thing you have in your hand isn't the kind of thing that can be explained by happenstance.
I have explained. Mostima is acting in her capacity as an employee of Penguin Logistics, and I am helping her guard the staff in her absence.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: You think I'm going to let some freak who talks to her staff off the hook?
F- freak...? Let's just pretend you didn't see that.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: She will be fine.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: I'm not worried about her.
Nor will she make trouble.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: ...I hope you're right.
...... (Perhaps I should just stay in the hotel.)
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Oh, here you are. What was that back there?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Just a flight of whimsy.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Your whimsy might have been a little too powerful. You knew Penguin Logistics was there, didn't you?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And as old as you are, you probably shouldn't exert yourself like that. You're not looking to cut it short, are you?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Just how much of my power do you think I expended?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...right.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Well how about you take your murderous aura down a notch? I've had just about all the ominous energy I can take.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So what happened?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I may have underestimated the vigilance of the youth. Lungmen's young people never fail to impress me.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: It is nothing major, but a few out of control puppets have injured a remarkably dedicated finball master. That is all.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: 'That is all?' I think you need to work on your expressions before you go saying things like that.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The one who always smiles never truly smiles. Compared to you, I am very relaxed.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Isn't this something you planned for?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Like, in order to prevent this conflict between Penguin Logistics and the mob from turning sour, you went looking for an excuse to punish them? Something like that?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Look at you, girl. It's such a waste to have you scrounging around with that penguin.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'll take that as a compliment.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...But I did not permit them to go trampling the slums. I would never permit that.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I have reached the end of my patience for their constant oversteps, and yet they still continue to disregard the rules.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I had assumed that if they maintained even a faint connection to Siracusa, they might be of some miniscule, interesting benefit to Lungmen... I am very disappointed.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Wait a second... why are you telling me all of this? This isn't like a 'reveal your whole plan before killing me to keep your secrets' sort of thing, is it?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Old people need to complain.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Oh yeah? Then I'll just treat it like a Sauin Carnival. I didn't hear a word you just said.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The more trouble the mafia stirs up, the bigger the balance I'm due on the other side.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And after you have that money?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: The first thing I'll do is buy that candy shop.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Heh. You really are attached.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Fine. Aside from the cellar, everything else is yours.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: There's a cellar...? Can't you try to protect my sweet memories, even a little bit?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's my shop.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That's too bad. I really thought you'd retire as something more like a grocer.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Maybe. If I'm still alive by the time I retire.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Time grows short. The Carnival is about to begin. The players in this show are already in position.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You're not watching from the sidelines anymore?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...the scenery here is lovely, isn't it?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Sauin is all about honoring the dead. And Lungmen is our city, after all.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: When the living enjoy their lively carousing, only then may the souls of the dead depart without regret.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: And if we have a rat with one foot in a coffin, unless it moves, one might mistake it for a deceased soul ready to depart.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: How are we supposed to do 'lively carousing?'
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Just like this.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Oh... I see.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Then this Sauin's expenses must be pretty high. Wasteful, even.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Smart girl.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Otherwise, Chief Wei would've come after you a long time ago.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Let's not speak of such matters. I certainly don't want to talk to the LGD again. So annoying.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But the key to a good show is when the actors foot the bill themselves.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: *Pant* *pant* Are those guys mobsters too? How much farther do we have to run?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Definitely not. They might be some of those thugs we ran into before. There's too many of them. Don't want to think about it. Just run. We can lose them.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But I just saw a guy running at us with a rolling pin...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: That's how these fights usually go. You don't come to the slums often?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sometimes they end up rolling some blood or teeth into the dough, and then a customer gets all pissed off when he bites into somebody else's tooth.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I really didn't need such a detailed explanation.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...Have you known Mostima for a long time?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You're getting pretty friendly with me now.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Mostima said she was testing me...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Oh? I never heard about that.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...I guess I didn't either.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Why do you look up to her so much? It's really different from the way you treat the rest of us.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She's kind of like... everything I ever hoped to be as a Messenger. She's done everything I ever hoped to do.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...I really envy her.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Even though I don't really get what's going on in her head.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: That's how it goes. I chased her from Laterano to Lungmen, then I met the boss, and all the way up to today, I still don't know what's going on in her head.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I've since given up. It's easier to just wait until she pops up right behind me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't be so gloomy... Wait, did you say from Laterano to Lungmen?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Uh huh. You caught that, did you? Don't give me that look. I'm just as good as Mostima. Maybe she's a little bit ahead, but...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No, it really doesn't matter to me. We should focus on meeting up with Texas.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hrm.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Wasn't that a little too hard?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That's justified self-defense. Don't sweat it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hey! Texas~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You're okay. But where's Mostima?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Do you really have to ask? She Mostima'd.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh. Sorry.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What are you sorry about? And what are you all looking at me for?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ahaha... Mostima came back. We'll see her again sooner or later.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But first, we should probably deal with these new bad guys...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: So what's this all about?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Some kinda revenge for us bein' too rowdy?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Maybe?! Are the slums always this violent?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Can't make friends if you don't throw down. Talkin' with yer fists is the oldest form of communication!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Got a call. It's the boss.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What's crackin'?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You ladies havin' fun? Feel like you're missing something?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: No? Good. Listen up.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Mr. Emperor... did you happen to buy a lot of insurance?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: There's a big Carnival Gala down on Luk Low Street for Sauin tonight. They got some no-name marketing thing going on.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: But I decided I'm gonna make an appearance there as your big time rap god.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: We'll bring some fire beats to Lungmen. They break down in tears, and bow down all nice and tidy.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: As for you, you're gonna watch my back. Then you scoop up all these wannabes chasin' us in one fell swoop.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Got it? Got it. Good. Make it happen.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: ...He hung up.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Feels like deja vu all over again.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So I guess we have to go to that party thing too?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yep. Let's hit the road!
attributes.name: Exusiai
